dbFlux has just created the directory structure.
In the directory db/_setup/users you will now find the following file(s)

    {{#each this.files}}

If you still have to create the schemas / users, import them in the given order by using Ctrl+Alt+B or cmd: dbFlux:Compile current file. Of course, you can also adjust them manually before.

Attention

Be carfull: If Schema or User exists it will be dropped

{{userFile}} was automatically added to .gitignore, because the password you specified was saved there.

Have fun developing with dbFlux.
